lender.name: Gernot
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us abundantly with wonderful children and good jobs. I want other people to be able to enjoy life as we do.
lender.occupational_info: teacher

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to try and put back a little to the countries in the world that gave me so much when I travelled to them.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Internet Marketing consultant - helping companies and organisations use the Internet to do more business.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I like donating money when it helps people to become self-sufficient; it's much better than relying on handouts.
lender.occupational_info: I check pages of textbooks that are about to be printed and sent to schools. I make sure that problems have correct working, that formatting is correct, and that there are no spelling or grammatical errors.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to improve the wealth and happiness of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a high school - teacher in politics and history.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a choice.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in political science, and work for the Tasmanian government in economic development.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in need.

I try to start different web ventures and make money and would like to help people out there.

lender.name: Edward Bond
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a care home helping look after elderly people who cannot look after themselves.

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe, that supporting people is the best way to help them. Kiva is a great connection tool to organize this kind of help worldwide. There is simply no excuse left anymore to do nothing:-)!
lender.occupational_info: No description about me (you´ll find everything relevant via "Check out"), but a few additional links about microcredits - in german language: Wikipedia: http://tinyurl.com/38hkeb GEO: http://tinyurl.com/m9ty4r Terra: http://tinyurl.com/r6aau9 Uni Duisburg: http://tinyurl.com/ok2rb8 Zeit-Artikel: http://goo.gl/e8bWi

lender.name: Arnold
lender.loan_because: I have long wanted to somehow be of help my fellowmen and share some of the blessing that I have, Kiva made this a simple task by being the intermediary to those in need of micro-financing. Kudos to everybody involved in Kiva.com!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I would like to give someone else the chance to work hard and succeed.

lender.name: Aditi & Jubin
lender.loan_because: We're really excited by this opportunity to effect change in the lives of so many people through such a simple action.
lender.occupational_info: We help companies and individuals choose the best opportunities for investing their money.

lender.name: Duane
lender.loan_because: I want to help. As members of the greatest country in the world, it's important to lift up those less fortunate. It helps to remind us how blessed we are.
lender.occupational_info: I am one of the millions of Americans who toil away on endless and meaningless tasks designed to line the pockets of the our government "representatives" and high powered executives.

lender.name: Amit
lender.occupation: manager in micro finance inthe country nepal

lender.name: khaled

lender.name: Alf
lender.loan_because: Micro loans improves sustainable development. Knowing who I loan to means I get a personal interest in the well being of the borrower.

lender.name: Mark Anthony
lender.loan_because: Because I want to start my own online services. I currently work as a virtual customer service rep for a US company and I am ready to expand or start my own. As a matter of fact, I already bought a domain name, I just need more money to pay website developer as well as new computer.
lender.occupational_info: I basically give virtual customer support to my clients customer. I also do research and data entry.

lender.name: Venn Apparel
lender.loan_because: it is a privilege and a pleasure.

lender.name: Frank S
lender.loan_because: my wonderful aunt and uncle encouraged me to help others =) and this is a great way to reach around the world and help those in need from the comfort of my own home!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: As a female entrepreneur, it was very difficult to get loans for my own business in the US. I have traveled to and lived in many countries and understand the courage of these individuals who are actively trying to improve their lives, those of their family and their community. It takes a certain kind of unique individual to start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: a simple thing that could mean the world to somebody else
lender.occupational_info: pharmacy student

lender.name: MARTHA LUCIA
lender.loan_because: Solicito el prestamo porque estoy interesada en elaborar proyectos encausados en la creación de microempresas para que mis alumnos sean autosuficientes. Para ello hay diferentes ideas en las cuales me gustaría que ustedes conocieran y apoyaran
lender.occupational_info: Elaboracion de proyectos viables para la cosntitucion de microempresas para que mis alumnos sean autosuficientes, ya que son estudiantes tecnicos de bajos recursos, en los cuales mi aporte es la construccion de sus ideas

lender.name: Wain
lender.loan_because: I believe it helps people to help themselves and kiva gives me confidence that the money goes to the right place
lender.occupational_info: I write software for helicopters, banks and desktop computers

lender.name: Monique and Chris

lender.occupational_info: i'm a writer!

lender.name: Ilse
lender.loan_because: I like small organisations where you can choose yourself what people you want to help. And that I myself can help people to have a better life. In the Western World we have so much, and it is good to share.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, and on my free saturday I work at the mail. So I spend my day with delivering mail to people's houses.

lender.loan_because: I want to do it! Go Chickens!
lender.occupational_info: My husband is a chemistry teacher. I am home with our two teenagers and I'm in college to become a teacher. I spend a lot of time with my elderly mother too.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I am happy to know that the little bit of financial assistance I am able to offer can make a large impact for individuals and groups who are trying to find ways to support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Coordinate research project for the University of California San Francisco Multiple Sclerosis Genetics Group. Researchers are attempting to identify the genes and alleles that make a person susceptible to developing Multiple Sclerosis and to better understand the disease process of this condition. Over 500 MS patients participate annually in the study that I coordinate which began in 2004.

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to empower people to realize their own ideas and maybe even little or big dreams.

lender.loan_because: I can and therefore I must!
lender.occupational_info: I design medical equipment using 100% recycled materials.

lender.occupational_info: I help manage a company that does marketing on the Internet for large pharmaceutical manufacturers (drug companies). My wife works for a hospital as therapist that helps injured workers return to work.

lender.occupational_info: I am retired but am active in an international students' homestay program with a local university. I've also taken up drawing/painting for the umpteenth time and hope to finally say "I'm an artist" with conviction.

lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I manage all the financial transactions for the company I work for

lender.name: Marie-Christina
lender.loan_because: I know that a helping hand can change a person's life. I've been helped and I need to pass my blessings on to someone else.

lender.name: Debra Marrs
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit. I believe everyone should have access to the finances to build their dream, support their families, and achieve success.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to write their life stories. But more importantly, I teach them how to share their stories with others through various means of publishing. You have a story to tell too. Write it if you can, or share with your children so they can learn from you.

lender.name: Chris & Jon
lender.loan_because: If we all help a little, we can achieve amazing results!
lender.occupational_info: Jon teaches English as a second language. Chris is a retired secretary.

lender.name: Gavin and Daria
lender.loan_because: we still believe we can all make a difference. Kiva makes us feel that the connection is more tangible and that the group we belong to can show that morality, compassion and community are not only a religious domain.
lender.occupational_info: Gavin works for a computer software company that believes technology can help people reach their potential. He works in an area called Business Intelligence that helps companies report on and analyse their data to better understand their business. Daria works as a training coordinator for case workers in refugee resettlement.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have been brought up in a family that believes in giving back. When we build bridges among caring, capable people, we make lives and the world a better place than we found it. I am blessed to be an entrepreneur and own my own successful business. I want to loan to help others be successful in their businesses as well. In addition, through participating in this program, I can continue to pass the legacy of giving on to my son. We talk and decide together who to give loans.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a business transformation and personal productivity consultant & coach and founder of Calahan Solutions, Inc. I work with intelligent, highly motivated, busy entrepreneurs, producers and other professionals to teach them how to do more with their time, space and information. I believe life is meant to be lived and that fabulous vision combined with practical systems can make that happen very quickly. I help small businesses develop and implement systems that allow them to take their businesses to the next level and help them unleash their profit potential.
I write regularly on 2 of my blogs as well as a number of industry blogs. I founded www.LearnFromOrganizingExperts.com to support others in my industry to grow and develop their businesses. In addition, I have authored many programs including "Find In Five Seconds" and the "D.A.R.T." system among others.
I frequently speak at conferences and workshops about business and personal productivity and how to create massive business success through systems and simplification.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have more than what I need and want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in technology sector.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Timo
lender.loan_because: I like the approach. Everybody should get a fair chance.
lender.occupational_info: Being a little drop of oil in a big human machinery that builds a world class product

lender.occupational_info: I study computers, and later I will be working on them.

lender.loan_because: a little U.S. money goes a long ways in some other countries and the karma comes back 10 fold

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: WE - not someone - have to fight unfair conditions. I am not wealthy myself but amazingly rich compared to most people in the world.

lender.loan_because: Continuing to pour aid money into the 3rd world does virtually nothing to promote their economic development, micro-financing does. Kiva helps us to help people to help themselves.

lender.loan_because: ...I have more than I need and others don't.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a network technician - I connect computers, buildings, companies and - of course - people :-)

lender.loan_because: it´s nice when people have dreams and ambitions and I like to see them come true.

lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: my family believes in the principle of giving
lender.occupational_info: We are a family that believes in serving others

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe that Kiva.org is a fantastic organization and allows a small or fledgling business owner the opportunity to realize his/her dream.
lender.occupational_info: I assist companies to improve productivity and flexibility and reduce costs to positively impact profitability. I currently work with Fortune 500 companies but I am looking to transition to assist smaller businesses to achieve great success.

lender.name: Giovanna
lender.loan_because: it's possible!

lender.name: Yohan
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I like to help people who share this entrepreneurial and creative spirit. Hopefully something good will come of it.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a software architect. I design software applications and systems for radio stations across South East Asia.

lender.name: Gervais
lender.loan_because: When i grew up, my mother and father tough me that, if you are fortunate enough to have a decent life, you should share with the ones who are not as fortunate as you are, so here i am ! My mother and father are now retired and approaching 80 years old and they still do community work. This is to show you that giving is like anything else, You learn it by seeing others do the same. If you learn it at a young age, you will do it all your life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm am an investment advisor / stock broker. I'm helping peoples investing their money in a usefull way for their future and the future of their loved ones.

lender.name: Jillian
lender.occupational_info: I care for the elderly and make their lives easier. I enjoy my work.

lender.name: Ms. Walters
lender.loan_because: My students and I believe that everyone should have a chance at a better life. We care about making a difference in communities in our neighborhood and all over the world!
lender.occupational_info: I have one of the best jobs in the world-educating children. I help children recognize their full potential-both academically and socially. In addition, I work with them to build their character, self-esteem, and independence. I LOVE what I do!

lender.name: JOHN
lender.loan_because: it has to be the right thing to do

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: I understand the need for funding a small business. I also realize that sometimes a little help makes a lot of difference!

lender.name: marc-oliver
lender.loan_because: a little help could lower the obstacles for others and maybe it opens new perspectives. empower people to make their ideas come true with the help of micro finance is just a striking concept.
lender.occupational_info: developing win-wins relationships and chances in the field of electronic commerce.

lender.name: Jen, Dan, TJ, Liv & Luc
lender.loan_because: We want to instill in our children the value of helping others

lender.name: alex
lender.loan_because: I like to

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I believe people need a helping hand once in a while
lender.occupational_info: I work very hard on a commercial crab boat and study hard in school when I am not out at sea. I want to do great things one day and become a successful person like my father.

lender.name: Nekisha-Michelle
lender.loan_because:
It is my greatest joy to live the bible as it says, I will be able to lend to many nations and not borrow. It makes me feel great knowing that I am assisting someone to live their dreams. I don't believe in struggle and it is a pleasure to do what I can to help my beautiful sisters across the world end their personal struggle and increase their self worth and self-esteem.
I know God is well pleased and I can sleep with a smile on my face. Whenever I have a need God meets my need but He always uses people to do it. So it is God using me to meet the needs of those who need the resources that I am fortunate to have. I am grateful and blessed to do it.
lender.occupational_info:
I help women take control of their life by providing life coaching. What I do is get an accurate understanding of the problems that a woman is having in her life. It could be money, self-esteem, love, relationships, weight or jobs. I help her figure out what to do so she can over come it and start to live her best situatuion and creating her best life with out struggle, depression, fear and poverty. I talk to these women that I coach through phone conversations which allows me to have clients worldwide.
I wrote a book to help the women understand what they can do to help themselves without personal coaching with me. I get to travel and do empowerment speaking as well.
I am also the radio talk show host of a weekly internet show called Living Vivaciously. My show is located on http://www.latalkradio.com each Monday.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I have a hundred reasons, but this is my most favorite. It makes me feel good that I am actually helping people and I get my money back after it. I feel really good after I do.
lender.occupational_info: I play and go to school.

lender.name: Jakob
lender.loan_because: I have spent quite some time traveling and living in developing countries and know that a (relatively) small amount of money can make all the difference in the world to people with little resources.

lender.name: Frankie
lender.loan_because: My son and daughter-in-law gave me a gift for Mother's Day to allow me to help others. What a wonderful gift.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art at a Montessori school. My students are from 4 to 11 years old.

lender.name: tiffany
lender.occupation: INTERESTED IN OPENING A SMALL BUSINESS

lender.name: Ernest
lender.loan_because: My family comes from Ghana and I know this money helps. I live in London , visit Ghana regularly and am a dual national.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct medical research to help the elderly

lender.name: Kaete
lender.loan_because: I believe that most people will help themselves if we just let them.
lender.occupational_info: I do social science research at a university, for instance how people on the grassroots level can be involved in technology development processes, particularly in the field of sustainable energy.

lender.name: Libby
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: Ollie

lender.occupational_info: I work for a shipping line and we transport cargo to/from many places around the world.

lender.loan_because: I hope that a small amount for me can make a significant difference for someone else.

lender.name: Tran
lender.loan_because: I want to open a free charity site for

lender.name: phuc
lender.loan_because: my wife just born a baby and i don't enough money to look after them. I am technician computer but after economic crisis i lost job. I intend open small shop internet but don't enough and need 1000 usd. Now situation very difficult , hope everybody help me and small family. very thanks.
lender.occupational_info: The First i will use my money and money borrow of you to buy computers and open shop internet. I think every month will have about 250 usd and i will pay for you later. Thank God and everybody, expect help from everybody. God will beside you.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: someday - and that day may never come - I'll may call upon you to do a service for ME. But until that day, accept this loan as gift on the day of my daughter's wedding.
lender.occupational_info: I write numbers on post it notes and paste them to letters written by others.

lender.name: Mr.Desmond
lender.occupation: LOAN OFFER TO THOSE IN NEED

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: A defining moment for me was the year I finished High School (1966). A kind friend of my mother's gave to me in my greatest hour of need. You see, I barely graduated high school because we didn't have the $68.00 needed to pay for school fees. My family migrated to Chicago after my father died in Arkansas in 1955. We grew up poor and had to depend on the welfare system for food and shelter. We were a family of 11 in the southern tradition. It wasn't much but we ate and had a place to stay. We had a chance to better ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with special needs children instructing them in reading, math, and language arts.

lender.name: Bob Dan and Pete
lender.loan_because: It's important to give others an opportunity to better themselves and their families.

lender.name: Steve Gotz
lender.occupational_info:
A passionate Entrepreneur, Innovation Evangelist, Skeptical Optimist, Non-conforming Mind and DIY-guy! Have worn more than a few different hats and most likely will wear a few more.
TOP 3 Life Goals: 1) Work with really cool people to create really cool technologies which change the world! 2) Measurably improve the lives of one billion people 3) Give back more than I take.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: ... all men (and women) are endowed with unalienable rights. Life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness... the loans support all three, but especially the pursuit of happiness

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world even a tiny bit better.

lender.name: Rouzhin
lender.loan_because:
"We are prone to judge success by the index of our salaries or the size of our automobiles, rather than by the quality of our service relationship to humanity."
Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.

lender.name: Honeychild
lender.loan_because: It makes me all smiley-like.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student.

lender.name: Sarah & Matt
lender.loan_because: I can look at my life and say "I've been given a lot" or "I've been given little". Either way it's good to give what you can to others, because there is always someone who has been given less than you.

lender.name: PH Low
lender.loan_because: I have been helped before and it is right to pass it on. Helping someone achieve something is priceless, more so if puts them in a better position after that.

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: People around the world share my personal values of aspiring to live a better life, to provide for their family, and to help their children have the opportunity to pursue an education and be able to reach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Tax Consulting

lender.name: Geli
lender.occupational_info: write articles for different companies

lender.name: Marjorie Wilson
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is a great way to end poverty.
lender.occupational_info: My major is International Studies (Global Resources and Development).

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I wanted to try and give honest, hard working people in other countries a chance to pursue their dreams too.
lender.occupational_info: Sitting at a desk in front of a computer most of the day.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: Best interest rate ever!
lender.occupational_info: I produce books on architecture.

lender.name: Dian Haryaty
lender.loan_because: i've been lucky in life and taught to give back.I've been told i'm exactly like my granddad in that aspect.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a rural GP locum-i go to small towns across West Australia relieving the country docs who need a break from work.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: it makes sense

lender.name: Shoichiro
lender.loan_because: I want to participate in various businesses in the world even only through lending funds.
lender.occupational_info: Software, translation, real estate, and agriculture.

lender.name: Ronny
lender.loan_because: I believe micro financing is the best way to help others create a future for themselves and their families :)
lender.occupational_info: Work with business development for a responsible travel website, and am an underwriter with a marine insurance company :)

lender.name: Elke
lender.loan_because: it makes sense: empower for self help
lender.occupational_info: information specialist

lender.name: Bjørn Olav
lender.loan_because: I have some money to spare, and hope to make a change for a new business proposal.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of Oslo.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: money makes the world go round...;-))

lender.name: Nsang
lender.loan_because: i think that does really help people.
lender.occupational_info: Nothing particular. I am not saving people lives.

lender.name: Kozmon Family
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate and we want to help others achieve security and prosperity in their own lives

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to help a little.

lender.name: FieldFirstGrade
lender.loan_because: As an International Baccalaureate Primary Years Programme School we are interested in creating ACTION that will help change the world!

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I cannot afford to give all of my money away, because in the future my family will need it. I can however afford to make good use of my money and put it to work accross the world
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Catholic charity, our work is evangelism in the UK

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I teach at a highschool that has a business class. My students are in charge of who the money is loaned to. They track how the business is doing. I originally got the KIVa account as a birthday gift!

lender.name: Ikemitsu
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve individuals' lives through small entrepreneurship that gives independence and freedom in a socially meaningful way.

lender.name: Slava Pastukhov
lender.loan_because: Bill Clinton told me to
lender.occupational_info: I make sure my company is connected to everyone online, making sure that people across the world have the option of knowing what we're doing.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: I don't hate it

lender.name: Klaus
lender.loan_because: I like the idea and the concept of kiva.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept of empowering others.
lender.occupational_info: Investing

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: it's easy, transparent and hopefully efficient.
lender.occupational_info: I create new partnerships for a e-commerce website

lender.name: Adriaan en Mieke
lender.loan_because: I think I can make a structural contribution by helping to enable people to take care of themselves. I myself was lucky enough to be born in a country where education is available and chances are plenty

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: I have been in the difficult situations before. I know the felling and would like to support those in need today to change their lives.

lender.name: Ruediger
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to encourage people by giving them the chance to help themselves without making them feel dependent

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: I have been an entrepreneur in Ireland for many years. I believe in helping a trier. Finance for aspiring business people in developing countries is essential. More important than aid.
lender.occupational_info: I teach entrepreneurship in a university.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I think through micro credits you can help to develop economies and reduce misery
lender.occupational_info: I teach german in a language school in Basel (Switzerland)

lender.name: Clive
lender.loan_because: I don´t like a world full of such inequality
lender.occupational_info: I work with disabled people

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Everyone should give. . . .

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I believe in the power of a dream and want others to have the resources to achieve theirs.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I support the notion of micro-credits and appreciate the grassroots approach Kiva is taking.

lender.name: Women Work, Women Win
lender.occupation: Jorgensen For Congress Raising Money For Women
lender.loan_because: In these difficult economic times we must help women across the US and the world realize their dreams of having a business. By helping them we manifest the change we want to see in the world...
lender.occupational_info: When women work, they win...

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves in a reasonable way.

lender.name: Jacko House
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students (and our teacher) from Cristo Rey Jesuit High School in Baltimore, MD. At our school, we are divided up into small goups with one teacher and 14-15 students. Our group is called "Jacko House" because Mr. Jacko is the teacher in charge of us.
